mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_good_snapshot(goodSnapShotNo, goodName, goodDescription, promotion, price, discount, mainImgUrl, createDate, goodId) VALUES (#{goodSnapShotNo}, #{goodName}, #{goodDescription}, #{promotion}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{mainImgUrl}, NOW(), #{goodId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, goodSnapShotNo, goodName, goodDescription, promotion, price, discount, mainImgUrl, createDate, goodId FROM t_good_snapshot WHERE id=#{id}
